meanings.definition: A type of white wine made from the Gewürztraminer grape.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a glass of gewurztraminers with my dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The store had a special offer on gewurztraminers, so I bought a bottle.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was impressed by the gewurztraminers label design.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the gewurztraminers filled the room, creating a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The gewurztraminers had a unique flavor that lingered on my palate.

meanings.definition: Plural form of Gewürztraminer, referring to multiple bottles or glasses of the wine.
meanings.sent1: We celebrated with several gewurztraminers after the successful event.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offered a variety of gewurztraminers on their wine list.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to have a gewurztraminers tasting party to compare different brands.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with gewurztraminers, ready for the holiday season.
meanings.sent5: The sound of corks popping signaled the start of the gewurztraminers celebration.
